document.full_text: egypt's publicly reviled former interior minister was jailed for 12 years on thursday, the first member of hosni mubarak's cabinet to be sentenced, a step that sent a message that no one in the new egypt is above the law.
document.title: mubarak's interior minister jailed in new-era egypt
lines_and_colors: egypt's publicly reviled former interior minister was jailed for 12 years on thursday, the first member of hosni mubarak's cabinet to be sentenced, a step that sent a message that no one in the new egypt is above the law.
